userInterests.title: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]My Interests
userInterests.pageDescription: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Help us understand your collecting interests! Add categories of items you'd like to follow, and we'll notify you when matching items become available in our auctions. You can always adjust your preferences here.
userInterests.searchInstructions: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Use the search box below to find and add categories that interest you. You can search by typing any part of the category path (e.g., 'Stamps', 'Germany', or '1900'). Categories where you've previously bid will remain in your list even when inactive, and you can reactivate them at any time using the search. Categories without bids will be removed when deactivated.
userInterests.noSearchResults: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]No matching categories found. Try different search terms.
userInterests.browseExplanation: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]View items that match your selected categories of interest. The items will be automatically filtered based on your active categories.
